profile.name: Brad Traversy
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Building Full-Stack Applications and AI Solutions at Traversy Media
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with expertise in JavaScript, Next.js, React Native, Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Prisma, MongoDB, Postgres, FastAPI, Python, and machine learning. Passionate about building scalable, efficient, and maintainable applications.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and developed multiple full-stack applications using Next.js, React Native, and Vue.js.
Implemented database management using Prisma and MongoDB for efficient data storage and retrieval.
Utilized TypeScript for robust type checking and error handling in various projects.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and Tailwind CSS.
Worked on open-source projects like traversypress-ui, friendly-dev-frontend, github-finder-tanstack-query, prostore, one-breath-journal, apiprobe, and traversy-js-challenges.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated multiple open-source projects on GitHub.
Collaborated with other developers to improve code quality, fix bugs, and add new features.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
description: Developed full-stack applications using JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and MongoDB for data storage.
Utilized Postgres for database management and FastAPI for API development.
